projects.title: Developing a Modified Deep Belief Network with Metaheuristic Optimization Algorithm for Predicting Face Emotion and Sentimental Analysis using Electroencephalogram
projects.description: This funding will support hosting outstanding international researchers. Associate Professor Dr. Neelakandan Subramani will join the lab as a Research Professor for 1 year through this funding.

projects.title: Development of Deep Learning Model to Evaluate Cognitive Status based on EEG data with Wavelet Transform Techniques
